meanings.sent1: The store sold sundry items like toys and books.
meanings.sent2: She had a sundry collection of colorful pens.
meanings.sent3: The sundry colors of the flowers made the garden look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were as sundry as the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The artist used sundry shades to create a beautiful painting.

meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the sundry rooms of the old house.

meanings.sent1: She rummaged through the box of sundry in search of a missing button.
